about_the_game:
This demo includes the tutorial and the first 10 levels, during which the first 7 spells can be acquired. It provides a great insight into the game's mechanics. If you complete each level on the first try, it takes approximately 30-35 minutes on the normal (Warmage) difficulty. The demo does not include side quests. Thank you for trying it out!


Action-packed, dynamic tower defense where mana management, strategic spellcasting and quick decisions are crucial. Know your enemies, defeat them with your deadliest spell build and become a master of magic!

UNLEASH YOUR ULTIMATE POWER

Running low on mana? No problem! Along with spells, you have access to a range of helpful abilities that you can unlock and upgrade as you progress through the story.

SET UP THE BEST SPELL BUILD

No mission is impossible, you can pick the right spell combinations for every battle. The variety of enemies ensures that you need to adapt your tactics.

USE THE POWER OF THE ELEMENTS

Got some fire mages giving you trouble? Alright, turn them into ice cubes.

PREPARE FOR CHALLENGING BOSS FIGHTS

Numerous boss fights await you on your journey. With leveling, learning, and patience, even the most formidable foes will fall before you.

FIGHT YOUR WAY ACROSS THE WORLD

The world of Aarnhagor is under grave threat. Influenced by an unknown force, the inhabitants of the world have turned against their own kind and begun to raze their own lands. When the peril reached Arn Faren, the city of the mage academy, Yoradhin, the dark elf warmage apprentice, attempted to break out of the besieged city.


The campaign guides you through 5 chapters and 60 levels to the end of the story, which are expanded with side quests that open up after each chapter. Fight your way across a variety of stunning landscapes, and unravel the exciting story of Yoradhin.

  • Dynamic and action-packed Tower Defense experience.
  • Blaze through the story-driven campaign's 60 levels to uncover the mysterious threat.
  • Face off against 32 different enemies and bosses.
  • Acquire all 30 spells and special abilities.
  • Prepare thoroughly for every fight, assemble the most effective spell combinations.
  • Collect and equip powerful items and become an unstoppable force.
  • Earn XP and level up Yoradhin to become the master of magic.
  • Complete side quests for extra rewards and challenges.
  • New Game+ mode offers an even greater challenge for seasoned players.
